wiki.content:
From the CD "My One and Only Thrill" released in 2009. Song written by Gardot/ Harris. Lead vocals, piano and guitar by Melody Gardot. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: From the CD "My One and Only Thrill" released in 2009. Song written by Gardot/ Harris. Lead vocals, piano and guitar by Melody Gardot.

name: Our Love Is Easy
comments: she's an inspiration to us all....  he life, her music.....
This Songs reminds me of my dog Lucky, who died almost 4 Months ago. :( (I was listening to this song mere minutes before he died.
ONE OF THE SWEETEST HEARTFELT VOICES TO COME ALONG IN A LONG TIME  BEAUTIFUL SONG BEAUTIFUL LADY
It reminds me of Gia's soundtrack film
My anthem to my lover. Thank you, Melody.
beautiful, like water rushing over  stone,
I am  spellbound  and speechless extraordinary effort  to accompany this love song
smooth as a manhattan in front of a crackling fireplace
